title: Automated React Performance Audit Tool | ReactReviewer
description: Identify and fix React performance bottlenecks instantly. Detect unnecessary re-renders, heavy computations, and memory leaks with AI.

hero.headline: Stop React Performance Regressions
hero.subheadline: Automatically detect and fix performance issues in your React codebase before they reach production.

features.title: Re-render Detection
features.description: Visualize component re-renders and identify wasted cycles.

features.title: Bundle Size Analysis
features.description: Track bundle size impact of every pull request.

features.title: Memory Leak Check
features.description: Find uncleaned effects and event listeners automatically.

faq.question: How does it check performance?
faq.answer: We use static analysis combined with AI to identify patterns known to cause performance issues.
